A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I love Disney and Star Wars but something feels off about this movie. It was good but for old Star Wars fans it left a feeling of disappointment and trust me I am not critical of Star Wars movies all episodes including the force awakens. I think I know what Rian is saying and doing with this movie but the purpose feels rude and a let down. There seems to be a lot of symbolism in the movie regarding old and new and it feels apparent they want to drop the old and it’s all over this movie. It’s very apparent that they don’t like the rumors\, guessing\, speculation etc because for the past two years they’ve thrown curve balls and created red herrings. It feels like they are trying to break the old fan base to create a new fan base and as Luke says he’s not the Last Jedi\, the war is just beginning. I don’t know maybe the next movie will have some real meat(info). I walked out confused and disappointed. Other imax hardcore Star Wars fan/audience walked out of the first show also seemed disappointed. Can I get a fan made movie on YouTube? In someways those are actually better.
